meanings.definition: To mistakenly identify someone or something.
meanings.sent1: She misidentifies her friend in the crowd.
meanings.sent2: The detective misidentifies the suspect in the lineup.
meanings.sent3: The robot misidentifies a banana as a phone.
meanings.sent4: The child misidentifies the shadows as monsters.
meanings.sent5: He misidentifies the actor in the movie as his neighbor.

meanings.sent1: The cashier misidentifies the fruit at the checkout.
meanings.sent2: The scientist misidentifies the species of bird in the forest.
meanings.sent3: The computer misidentifies a cat as a dog in the image.
meanings.sent4: The student misidentifies the math problem as addition instead of subtraction.
meanings.sent5: She misidentifies the car model as a different brand.
